attributes.action: GET SOUTH LANARKSHIRE COUNCIL TO PROVIDE PROPERTY IN EAST KILBRIDE TOWN CENTER FOR LOCAL CHARITY LOAVES N FISHES
attributes.additional_details: Loaves and fishes is a local charity providing a food bank in the EAST KILBRIDE area to benefit the people of EASTKILBRIDE. They need a more local premises with low costs. The people of EASTKILBRIDE want South Lanarkshire council to provide the charity with these premises in the Town Center to benefit those in need in EAST KILBRIDE
